body: The following are alternative patrons themes that a witch can choose.
name: Witch Patron Themes
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes

sections.name: Ancestors
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Ancestors

sections.body: 2nd—deathwatch, 4th—blessing of courage and life, 6th—speak with dead, 8th—rest eternal, 10th—suffocation, 12th—circle of death, 14th—finger of death, 16th—symbol of death, 18th—power word kill.
sections.name: Death
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Death

sections.body: 2nd—unnatural lust, 4th—calm emotions, 6th—unadulterated loathing, 8th—overwhelming grief, 10th—dominate person, 12th—geas, 14th—euphoric tranquility, 16th—demand, 18th—dominate monster.
sections.name: Enchantment
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Enchantment

sections.body: 2nd—remove fear, 4th—lesser restoration, 6th—remove disease, 8th—restoration, 10th—cleanse, 12th—pillar of life 14th—greater restoration, 16th—mass cure critical wounds, 18th—true resurrection.
sections.name: Healing
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Healing

sections.body: 2nd—memory lapse, 4th—hideous laughter, 6th—distracting cacophony, 8th—confusion, 10th—mind fog, 12th—envious urge, 14th—insanity, 16th—symbol of insanity, 18th—overwhelming presence.
sections.name: Insanity
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Insanity

sections.body: 2nd—dancing lantern, 4th—continual flame, 6th—daylight, 8th—rainbow pattern, 10th—fire snake, 12th—sirocco, 14th—sunbeam, 16th—sunburst, 18th—fiery body.
sections.name: Light
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Light

sections.body: 2nd—darkness, 4th—darkvision, 6th—owl's wisdom, 8th—moonstruck, 10th—aspect of the wolf, 12th—control water, 14th—lunar veil, 16th—horrid wilting, 18th—meteor swarm.
sections.name: Moon
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Moon

sections.body: 2nd—detect undead, 4th—command undead, 6th—twilight knife, 8th—black tentacles, 10th—snake staff, 12th—create undead, 14th—waves of exhaustion, 16th—trap the soul, 18th—gate.
sections.name: Occult
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Occult

sections.body: 2nd—ill-omen, 4th—locate object, 6th—blood biography, 8th—divination, 10th—contact other plane, 12th—legend lore, 14th—vision, 16th—moment of prescience, 18th—foresight.
sections.name: Portents
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Portents

sections.body: 2nd—ghostbane dirge, 4th—invisibility, 6th—speak with dead, 8th—spiritual ally, 10th—mass ghostbane dirge, 12th—shadow walk, 14th—ethereal jaunt, 16th—planar ally, 18th—etherealness.
sections.name: Spirits
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Spirits

sections.body: 2nd—faerie fire, 4th—dust of twilight, 6th—guiding star, 8th—wandering star motes, 10th—dream, 12th—cloak of dreams 14th—circle of clarity, 16th—euphoric tranquility, 18th—astral projection.
sections.name: Stars

sections.name: Time
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Time

sections.body: 2nd—burning hands, 4th—burning gaze, 6th—pain strike, 8th—shout, 10th—symbol of pain, 12th—mass pain strike, 14th—phantasmal revenge 16th—incendiary cloud, 18th—winds of vengeance.
sections.name: Vengeance
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Patron Themes/Vengeance

sections.body: 2nd—unshakable chill, 4th—resist energy (cold only), 6th—ice storm, 8th—wall of ice, 10th—cone of cold, 12th—freezing sphere 14th—control weather, 16th—polar ray, 18th—polar midnight.
